thread.title: Saturday Night Takeaway airs swearing before the watershed | Daily Star
thread.title_full: Saturday Night Takeaway airs swearing before the watershed | Daily Star

author: Molly Rose Pike
title: Saturday Night Takeaway airs swearing before the watershed | Daily Star
text:
Ant and Dec reveal fears of falling down stairs on Saturday Night Takeaway 
Ant and Dec are planning a visit to Disney World in Florida and were surprising guests with a chance to join them. 
The Geordie hosts chose people from the audience and viewers watching at home — but one went horribly wrong. 
They filmed a woman called Claire at home with her family and told her they'd won a free holiday. 
itv APOLOGY: Dec had to apologise for the swearing Ant and Dec in pictures Friday, 10th June 2016 Celebrate this dynamic duo in pictures 1 / 41 PA Anthony McPartlin (left) and Declan Donnelly aka Ant and Dec, who have both been awarded an OBE in the Queen's Birthday Honours for services to Broadcasting and Entertainment 
Claire didn't believe it and accidentally swore on live TV. 
"F**k off! F**k off!" she shouted. 
Later, Dec was forced to apologise for the swearing. 
itv WHOOPS: Claire started swearing live on air 
itv DREAM HOLIDAY: Ant and Dec are going to Disney World “Somebody got a bit excited there” Dec 
"I have to apologise if somebody got a bit excited there and said something they didn't mean to," Dec said. 
Ant found the situation hilarious and could be heard laughing off camera. 
Viewers thought the moment was telly gold. 
itv SURPRISE: Ant and Dec were choosing random guests Best TV Moments of 2017 Monday, 20th February 2017 Take a look at the best moments that have appeared on TV in 2017 1 / 25 
"This hasn't gone to plan then," one tweeted. 
Another posted: "Lol at the woman who actually just said f**k off on live TV!" 
"Love Laura's F OFF at her surprise," another laughed. Related articles
